title: New: Solar Year – Night & Day
content: Having recently signed to the brand spanking new No Fear Of Pop curated label Stratosfear, Montreal duo Solar Year have dropped the debut single from said label. Night & Day is everything that’s so invigorating about electronic music at the moment; chopped vocals and twisted beats, all tied together into something that comes out as vaguely coherent. Check it out below, and order it here. (Premiered via The Fader)
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
